name: Detroit Simalator
description:
!THIS GAME IS A CLASS PROJECT!

this is one of my first published 2D games, though I don't really like publishing my games because I think they're weird and no one would get the jokes, my mom encouraged me to publish them so my aunts and uncles, and cousins could play them so here it is!

DETROIT SIMALATOR

controls: WASD = movement. SHIFT=Run. E = interact
